name: mcp-ecommerce-demo
description: MCP E-commerce Demo - Complete system with Vue frontend, FastAPI backend, and MCP server

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "MCP,Backend,Frontend" -c "cyan,yellow,green" "npm run dev:mcp" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:mcp: cd mcp-server && export $(cat ../.env | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && PORT=3003 ENVIRONMENT=production ./venv/bin/python3 main.py
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && export $(cat ../.env | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && PORT=8001 ./venv/bin/python3 main.py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate && cd ../mcp-server && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate && cd ..
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/__pycache__ mcp-server/__pycache__ backend/venv mcp-server/venv backend/.deps_installed mcp-server/.deps_installed
